title: Gift of life
creator_contributor_role: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Blood
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Blood donors
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Blood - Transfusion

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Red Cross
description: An account of the collections of blood from donors and its use in hospitals. Stresses the need for blood for transfusions every hour as part of medical service today; the procedure of voluntary donation, facilities provided and the careful labelling, testing and typing carried out by the Red Cross staff; the method of refrigerated storage and transport; use of separated components; an operation in process with the assistance of blood transfusions.
